title: Baked amasi chicken with lemon and rosemary
text:
Grease an ovenproof dish with non-stick spray.

1. Put the chicken, amasi, garlic and onions in a marinating dish. Mix well and leave to marinate overnight.

2. Preheat the oven to 180°C. Remove the chicken, onion and garlic from the marinade and arrange in the oven-proof dish.

3. Season the chicken with the lemon juice, zest and spice mix. Tuck the rosemary between the chicken pieces and drizzle the oil over.

4. Bake for 45-60 minutes or until golden brown and done. Serve with lemon slices or wedges.
description: The chicken is also delicious braaied over the coals.
